about:
As a software developer, I am passionate about building backend APIs for immersive exploration games and creating front-end web applications that showcase my love for comics and manga. Outside of software development, I enjoy reading sci-fi novels and manga, playing strategy RPG games, and going to the gym.

My experience as a Data Analyst Associate has honed my ability to approach tasks with caution and articulate issues effectively. With expertise in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Python, C++, and Typescript, I can provide scalable frameworks for mobile and web development. I enjoy collaborating with teams to bring projects to life, from inception to deployment, and my attention to detail ensures high-quality results.
